Testimony begins in trial of Patuawa Nathan, accused of murdering brother Challas Nathan at Auckland home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/testimony-begins-in-trial-of-patuawa-nathan-accused-of-murdering-brother-challas-nathan-at-auckland-home/J4N2YUA3RRCMJOH63TYW7DEKGQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/testimony-begins-in-trial-of-patuawa-nathan-accused-of-murdering-brother-challas-nathan-at-auckland-home/J4N2YUA3RRCMJOH63TYW7DEKGQ/ Craig Kapitan'F***ing told you I wasn’t joking,' he said when police told him of his brother's death.
